Original: That request comes from Kohst, an
[Color:5]Yggdrasil researcher[Color:0] for the Empire.
[Page]
He wants you to investigate an unusual
metal found in the [Color:5]Echoing Library[Color:0].
[Page]
He wanted to talk to you directly,
however... It all sounded quite
complicated.
[Page]
He is sitting just over there if you
wish to speak to him for more details.
I shall await your swift return.
Translation: That request comes from Kohst, an
[Color:5]Yggdrasil researcher[Color:0] for the Empire.
[Page]
He wants you to investigate an unusual
metal found in the [Color:5]Echoing Library[Color:0].
[Page]
He wanted to talk to you directly,
however... It all sounded quite
complicated.
[Page]
He is sitting just over there if you
wish to speak to him for more details.
I shall await your swift return.

Original: I again thank you for your hard work.
The client was here the entire time,
so I heard what went on.
[Page]
You went back and forth, back and
forth, until you fought a monster...
How very like your guild, haha.
[Page]
This request seems to have reinforced
the bonds between everyone... Maybe it
went so smoothly because it was you.
[Page]
I suppose this short sword is a symbol
of that bond. Take good care of it!
[Page]
But what a long ordeal you've had...
You must be tired. I think this one
will be on the house.
Translation: I again thank you for your hard work.
The client was here the entire time,
so I heard what went on.
[Page]
You went back and forth, back and
forth, until you fought a monster...
How very like your guild, haha.
[Page]
This request seems to have reinforced
the bonds between everyone... Maybe it
went so smoothly because it was you.
[Page]
I suppose this short sword is a symbol
of that bond. Take good care of it!
[Page]
But what a long ordeal you've had...
You must be tired. I think this one
will be on the house.

Original: Is something the matter? How can I
help you, Guild [Guild]?
Translation: Is something the matter? How can I
help you, Guild [Guild]?

Original: [Color:5]Show him the metal shard?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Show him the metal shard?[Color:0]

Original: What the devil is this? It looks to
be a shard of some sort...
[Page]
You received it from an Imperial
scientist, you say? And you came
to me to see if I knew anything...
[Page]
Unfortunately, my friends, I have many
artifacts related to Yggdrasil, but
none that might fit this device.
[Page]
You might try the Vessels or the
Sentinels. They may know something
about the shard.
Translation: What the devil is this? It looks to
be a shard of some sort...
[Page]
You received it from an Imperial
scientist, you say? And you came
to me to see if I knew anything...
[Page]
Unfortunately, my friends, I have many
artifacts related to Yggdrasil, but
none that might fit this device.
[Page]
You might try the Vessels or the
Sentinels. They may know something
about the shard.

Original: You are my dearest friends! Just
because you have no business with
me hardly means you cannot visit.
[Page]
Let me pour you some tea! No need
to be modest, just take your time
and relax.
Translation: You are my dearest friends! Just
because you have no business with
me hardly means you cannot visit.
[Page]
Let me pour you some tea! No need
to be modest, just take your time
and relax.

Original: Ah, my friends from Guild [Guild]!
How has the request from the Imperial
scientist been progressing?
Translation: Ah, my friends from Guild [Guild]!
How has the request from the Imperial
scientist been progressing?

Original: [Color:5]Show him the [Color:6][Item:1469]?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Show him the [Color:6][Item:1469]?[Color:0]

Original: Ah, you formed this disc by collecting
pieces from the Vessels, the Empire,
and the Sentinels?
[Page]
Even after collecting them all,
is there no room on this disc for
Tharsis... Hm!?
[Page]
I believe I do remember something
about this disc! Take a look at this
hole in the center... Wait here!
Translation: Ah, you formed this disc by collecting
pieces from the Vessels, the Empire,
and the Sentinels?
[Page]
Even after collecting them all,
is there no room on this disc for
Tharsis... Hm!?
[Page]
I believe I do remember something
about this disc! Take a look at this
hole in the center... Wait here!

Original: This was a treasure of our ancestors,
supposedly discovered in the Lush
Woodlands.
[Page]
Now that I see the shards have formed
a disc, I understand the purpose of
this hole. Kindly hand me that...
[Page]
And... Aha!
[Page]
It fits perfectly! Take a look, my
friends! The disc is complete!
Brilliant, if I say so myself!
[Page]
The Imperials, the Vessels, the
Sentinels, and we citizens of
Tharsis... The "circle" is complete!
[Page]
Hahah! Ahhh... Here, you should take
this with you.
[Page]
I am curious about what this strange
disc might lead to. Now then, my
friends, safe travels!
Translation: This was a treasure of our ancestors,
supposedly discovered in the Lush
Woodlands.
[Page]
Now that I see the shards have formed
a disc, I understand the purpose of
this hole. Kindly hand me that...
[Page]
And... Aha!
[Page]
It fits perfectly! Take a look, my
friends! The disc is complete!
Brilliant, if I say so myself!
[Page]
The Imperials, the Vessels, the
Sentinels, and we citizens of
Tharsis... The "circle" is complete!
[Page]
Hahah! Ahhh... Here, you should take
this with you.
[Page]
I am curious about what this strange
disc might lead to. Now then, my
friends, safe travels!

Original: Oh, you needn't feign humility. I do
so hate being left out of the loop!
Translation: Oh, you needn't feign humility. I do
so hate being left out of the loop!

Original: Oh? What's this? How can I help you
today, my friends of Guild [Guild]?
Translation: Oh? What's this? How can I help you
today, my friends of Guild [Guild]?

Original: [Color:5]Show him the [Color:6][Item:1469]?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Show him the [Color:6][Item:1469]?[Color:0]

Original: Ah, you formed this disc by collecting
pieces from the Vessels, the Empire,
and the Sentinels?
[Page]
Even after collecting them all,
is there no room on this disc for
Tharsis... Hm!?
[Page]
I believe I do remember something
about this disc! Take a look at this
hole in the center... Wait here!
Translation: Ah, you formed this disc by collecting
pieces from the Vessels, the Empire,
and the Sentinels?
[Page]
Even after collecting them all,
is there no room on this disc for
Tharsis... Hm!?
[Page]
I believe I do remember something
about this disc! Take a look at this
hole in the center... Wait here!

Original: This treasure was passed down by our
ancestors, but was supposedly found
originally in the Lush Woodlands.
[Page]
And... Aha!
[Page]
It fits perfectly! Take a look, my
friends! The disc is complete!
Brilliant, if I say so myself!
[Page]
The Imperials, the Vessels, the
Sentinels, and we citizens of
Tharsis... The "circle" is complete!
[Page]
Hahah! Ahhh... Here, you should take
this with you.
[Page]
I am curious about what this strange
disc might lead to. Now then, my
friends, safe travels!
Translation: This treasure was passed down by our
ancestors, but was supposedly found
originally in the Lush Woodlands.
[Page]
And... Aha!
[Page]
It fits perfectly! Take a look, my
friends! The disc is complete!
Brilliant, if I say so myself!
[Page]
The Imperials, the Vessels, the
Sentinels, and we citizens of
Tharsis... The "circle" is complete!
[Page]
Hahah! Ahhh... Here, you should take
this with you.
[Page]
I am curious about what this strange
disc might lead to. Now then, my
friends, safe travels!

Original: I understand just from the look in
your eyes... You came here because you
have something important. Am I right?
Translation: I understand just from the look in
your eyes... You came here because you
have something important. Am I right?

Original: You arrive at the Vessel Town and see
a lone woman.
[Page]
You cannot see the harm in asking the
woman about the metal shard...
Translation: You arrive at the Vessel Town and see
a lone woman.
[Page]
You cannot see the harm in asking the
woman about the metal shard...

Original: A Vessel woman is cooking near the
entrance.
[Page]
You cannot see the harm in asking the
woman about the metal shard...
Translation: A Vessel woman is cooking near the
entrance.
[Page]
You cannot see the harm in asking the
woman about the metal shard...

Original: [Color:5]Ask her about the shard?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Ask her about the shard?[Color:0]

Original: "Oh, the [Guild] Guild. It is good
to see you again. How can I help you
today?"
[Page]
You show her the metal shard and ask
if she knows anything about it. She
stares at it and finally speaks.
[Page]
"I do remember something about this...
Please wait here."
Translation: "Oh, the [Guild] Guild. It is good
to see you again. How can I help you
today?"
[Page]
You show her the metal shard and ask
if she knows anything about it. She
stares at it and finally speaks.
[Page]
"I do remember something about this...
Please wait here."

Original: "Here. It looks much the same, doesn't
it? It was in the Vessels' treasure
house, covered in dust."
[Page]
This metal shard is shaped like the
one you received from the Sentinels.
You fit them together to form a disc!
[Page]
"This may be the key to open the
sealed door at the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0].
It is to the west of this land...
[Page]
"As you may know, there is a tightly
sealed door in that labyrinth and a
recession with a very similar shape.
[Page]
"I believe you should keep this...
It is better that way. The Medium
would most likely agree."
Translation: "Here. It looks much the same, doesn't
it? It was in the Vessels' treasure
house, covered in dust."
[Page]
This metal shard is shaped like the
one you received from the Sentinels.
You fit them together to form a disc!
[Page]
"This may be the key to open the
sealed door at the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0].
It is to the west of this land...
[Page]
"As you may know, there is a tightly
sealed door in that labyrinth and a
recession with a very similar shape.
[Page]
"I believe you should keep this...
It is better that way. The Medium
would most likely agree."

Original: You thank the woman, who nods and
excuses herself before leaving.
[Page]
The client's parchment about a garden
where scales dance must have been
written about the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0]...
Translation: You thank the woman, who nods and
excuses herself before leaving.
[Page]
The client's parchment about a garden
where scales dance must have been
written about the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0]...

Original: "Here. It looks much the same, doesn't
it? It was in the Vessels' treasure
house, covered in dust."
[Page]
This metal shard is shaped like the
one you already have. You put the
shards together to form a perfect fit!
[Page]
"We found it deep in the labyrinth
recently but could not discern its
use, so we left it as is.
[Page]
"It looks like if you added another,
similar shard, it would make a
perfect disc."
[Page]
With that, the Vessel gasps as if
suddenly remembering something...
[Page]
"This may be the key to open the door
in the moth labyrinth... the Moth's
Garden.
[Page]
"As you may know, there is a tightly
sealed door in that labyrinth and a
recession with a very similar shape.
[Page]
"I believe you should keep this...
It is better that way. The Medium
would most likely agree."
Translation: "Here. It looks much the same, doesn't
it? It was in the Vessels' treasure
house, covered in dust."
[Page]
This metal shard is shaped like the
one you already have. You put the
shards together to form a perfect fit!
[Page]
"We found it deep in the labyrinth
recently but could not discern its
use, so we left it as is.
[Page]
"It looks like if you added another,
similar shard, it would make a
perfect disc."
[Page]
With that, the Vessel gasps as if
suddenly remembering something...
[Page]
"This may be the key to open the door
in the moth labyrinth... the Moth's
Garden.
[Page]
"As you may know, there is a tightly
sealed door in that labyrinth and a
recession with a very similar shape.
[Page]
"I believe you should keep this...
It is better that way. The Medium
would most likely agree."

Original: You thank the woman, who nods and
excuses herself before leaving.
[Page]
The client's parchment about a garden
where scales dance must have been
written about the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0]...
Translation: You thank the woman, who nods and
excuses herself before leaving.
[Page]
The client's parchment about a garden
where scales dance must have been
written about the [Color:5]Moth's Garden[Color:0]...

Original: You decide to leave Vessel Town and
continue your investigation.
Translation: You decide to leave Vessel Town and
continue your investigation.

Original: When you reach the Sentinels' village,
you notice one of them sitting on
the ground, carving something.
[Page]
You wonder if you should ask him about
the metal shard...
Translation: When you reach the Sentinels' village,
you notice one of them sitting on
the ground, carving something.
[Page]
You wonder if you should ask him about
the metal shard...

Original: In front of you sits a Sentinel on
the ground, carving something...
[Page]
You wonder if you should ask him about
the metal shard...
Translation: In front of you sits a Sentinel on
the ground, carving something...
[Page]
You wonder if you should ask him about
the metal shard...

Original: [Color:5]Ask the Sentinel?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Ask the Sentinel?[Color:0]

Original: "Ah... [Guild]. Welcome to the
Sentinels' village. Is there something
you would like to ask?"
[Page]
You hand the metal shard to the
Sentinel and ask if he has any
notion what it might be.
[Page]
"Hmm... I remember seeing something
with this exact shape at a shrine
in a stone cave...
[Page]
"Wait here and I will see if I can
find it." The Sentinel disappears
into the village.
Translation: "Ah... [Guild]. Welcome to the
Sentinels' village. Is there something
you would like to ask?"
[Page]
You hand the metal shard to the
Sentinel and ask if he has any
notion what it might be.
[Page]
"Hmm... I remember seeing something
with this exact shape at a shrine
in a stone cave...
[Page]
"Wait here and I will see if I can
find it." The Sentinel disappears
into the village.

Original: "Is this what you were looking for?"
[Page]
The metal shard he holds has the same
shape as the one from the Vessels.
When fit together, they form a disc!
[Page]
"Hm... so three become one. But even
so, something seems missing...
[Page]
"A shard from the Empire, the Vessels,
and we Sentinels... Does anything
seem obviously missing there?
[Page]
"Ah well. I do not think yours are the
wrong hands for it. I will let you
hold on to it for now."
[Page]
With that said, the Sentinel sits back
down and returns to his whittling.
Translation: "Is this what you were looking for?"
[Page]
The metal shard he holds has the same
shape as the one from the Vessels.
When fit together, they form a disc!
[Page]
"Hm... so three become one. But even
so, something seems missing...
[Page]
"A shard from the Empire, the Vessels,
and we Sentinels... Does anything
seem obviously missing there?
[Page]
"Ah well. I do not think yours are the
wrong hands for it. I will let you
hold on to it for now."
[Page]
With that said, the Sentinel sits back
down and returns to his whittling.

Original: "Is this what you were looking for?"
[Page]
This metal shard is shaped like the
one you already have. You put the
shards together to form a perfect fit!
[Page]
"Hm... You seem to lack only one to
make a complete circle. The three
will become one...
[Page]
"Does anything feel missing from the
shards you have?
[Page]
"Ah well. I do not think yours are the
wrong hands for it. I will let you
hold on to it for now."
[Page]
With that said, the Sentinel sits back
down and returns to his whittling.
Translation: "Is this what you were looking for?"
[Page]
This metal shard is shaped like the
one you already have. You put the
shards together to form a perfect fit!
[Page]
"Hm... You seem to lack only one to
make a complete circle. The three
will become one...
[Page]
"Does anything feel missing from the
shards you have?
[Page]
"Ah well. I do not think yours are the
wrong hands for it. I will let you
hold on to it for now."
[Page]
With that said, the Sentinel sits back
down and returns to his whittling.

Original: You thank the Sentinel and move on in
your attempt to solve the mystery of
the metal shards.
Translation: You thank the Sentinel and move on in
your attempt to solve the mystery of
the metal shards.

Original: In your journey through the labyrinth,
you come across a door with a much
different design than the others.
[Page]
The door is tightly sealed, but you
discover a round recession in its
center.
[Page]
Though you try several different
methods, the door does not budge.
Translation: In your journey through the labyrinth,
you come across a door with a much
different design than the others.
[Page]
The door is tightly sealed, but you
discover a round recession in its
center.
[Page]
Though you try several different
methods, the door does not budge.

Original: The door before you is tightly
sealed...
Translation: The door before you is tightly
sealed...

Original: As the Vessel said, the door you
reach has a much different design
than the others.
[Page]
The door is tightly sealed, but you
discover a round recession in its
center.
[Page]
You try the semicircular metal shard
and see that it is the perfect size
to fit the door.
[Page]
Perhaps once all the metal shards
are collected, the door will open.
Translation: As the Vessel said, the door you
reach has a much different design
than the others.
[Page]
The door is tightly sealed, but you
discover a round recession in its
center.
[Page]
You try the semicircular metal shard
and see that it is the perfect size
to fit the door.
[Page]
Perhaps once all the metal shards
are collected, the door will open.

Original: In your journey through the labyrinth,
you come across a door with a much
different design than the others.
[Page]
The door is tightly sealed, but you
discover a round recession in its
center.
[Page]
You try the semicircular metal shard
and see that it is the perfect size
to fit the door.
[Page]
Perhaps once all the metal shards
are collected, the door will open.
Translation: In your journey through the labyrinth,
you come across a door with a much
different design than the others.
[Page]
The door is tightly sealed, but you
discover a round recession in its
center.
[Page]
You try the semicircular metal shard
and see that it is the perfect size
to fit the door.
[Page]
Perhaps once all the metal shards
are collected, the door will open.

Original: You arrive at a strange door that
has a very different design than
the others.
[Page]
The door is tightly sealed, but you
discover a round recession in its
center.
[Page]
The disc, made of shards from the
client, the Vessels, and the
Sentinels, seems to fit.
Translation: You arrive at a strange door that
has a very different design than
the others.
[Page]
The door is tightly sealed, but you
discover a round recession in its
center.
[Page]
The disc, made of shards from the
client, the Vessels, and the
Sentinels, seems to fit.

Original: [Color:5]Insert the disc?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Insert the disc?[Color:0]

Original: You produce the old disc and put it
in the door...
[Page]
Though the shape is a perfect fit,
nothing seems to happen... Perhaps
the disc is not yet complete.
Translation: You produce the old disc and put it
in the door...
[Page]
Though the shape is a perfect fit,
nothing seems to happen... Perhaps
the disc is not yet complete.

Original: Intent on completing the request from
the Imperial scientist, you arrive
at the door.
[Page]
Though it is tightly sealed, you can
place the assembled disc into the
recession in the door's center.
Translation: Intent on completing the request from
the Imperial scientist, you arrive
at the door.
[Page]
Though it is tightly sealed, you can
place the assembled disc into the
recession in the door's center.

Original: Though the door is tightly sealed,
you can place the assembled disc into
the recession in the door's center.
Translation: Though the door is tightly sealed,
you can place the assembled disc into
the recession in the door's center.

Original: [Color:5]Insert the disc?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Insert the disc?[Color:0]

Original: You produce the metal disc and slowly
fit it into the door's recession...
[Page]
Suddenly, the disc spins rapidly and
a sharp whistling sound rings out...
[Page]
When the ringing subsides, you hear
mechanical sounds coming from inside
the door. Has it unlocked...?
[Page]
You know not what awaits you beyond
the door. You wipe anxious sweat from
your brow as you consider opening it.
Translation: You produce the metal disc and slowly
fit it into the door's recession...
[Page]
Suddenly, the disc spins rapidly and
a sharp whistling sound rings out...
[Page]
When the ringing subsides, you hear
mechanical sounds coming from inside
the door. Has it unlocked...?
[Page]
You know not what awaits you beyond
the door. You wipe anxious sweat from
your brow as you consider opening it.

Original: When you think yourself prepared,
you go through into a small room. A
short sword pierces the ground here.
[Page]
Its blade shines more beautifully than
any sword you have seen... It must be
the jeweled sword your client wants.
[Page]
But when you reach for the sword, it
abruptly rises into the air and emits
a piercing light!
Translation: When you think yourself prepared,
you go through into a small room. A
short sword pierces the ground here.
[Page]
Its blade shines more beautifully than
any sword you have seen... It must be
the jeweled sword your client wants.
[Page]
But when you reach for the sword, it
abruptly rises into the air and emits
a piercing light!

Original: From the glaring stream of light, you
see the figure of an enormous bird,
a fearsomely divine presence...
[Page]
Does the jeweled sword change form?
You no longer see it in the room...
[Page]
The monstrous bird stays hovering in
one spot, looking down upon you as if
passing judgement...
[Page]
You will need to bring the bird to the
ground before you can properly search
for the jeweled sword in the room.
[Page]
You grit your teeth and steady
yourself for battle, fingers lightly
brushing your weapons...
Translation: From the glaring stream of light, you
see the figure of an enormous bird,
a fearsomely divine presence...
[Page]
Does the jeweled sword change form?
You no longer see it in the room...
[Page]
The monstrous bird stays hovering in
one spot, looking down upon you as if
passing judgement...
[Page]
You will need to bring the bird to the
ground before you can properly search
for the jeweled sword in the room.
[Page]
You grit your teeth and steady
yourself for battle, fingers lightly
brushing your weapons...

Original: Though its blinding speed tosses
you about, your indomitable spirit
eventually brings the bird down!
[Page]
At last, the monster's body emits
an intense light and it resumes the
form of a short sword!
Translation: Though its blinding speed tosses
you about, your indomitable spirit
eventually brings the bird down!
[Page]
At last, the monster's body emits
an intense light and it resumes the
form of a short sword!

Original: You are mesmerized by the pure,
beautiful blade, but the spell is
broken by someone calling to you.
Translation: You are mesmerized by the pure,
beautiful blade, but the spell is
broken by someone calling to you.

Original: An out-of-breath Vessel woman runs
into the room. It is the one who gave
you the metal shard...
[Page]
"I am too late! Oh... Hm? That short
sword... Did you truly defeat the
monster?"
[Page]
Impressed, she continues. "After I
gave you the metal shard, the village
elder was shocked."
Translation: An out-of-breath Vessel woman runs
into the room. It is the one who gave
you the metal shard...
[Page]
"I am too late! Oh... Hm? That short
sword... Did you truly defeat the
monster?"
[Page]
Impressed, she continues. "After I
gave you the metal shard, the village
elder was shocked."

Original: You have finally acquired the jeweled
sword your client requested!
[Page]
You need only report this achievement
and deliver the sword to him before
you can collect your reward!
Translation: You have finally acquired the jeweled
sword your client requested!
[Page]
You need only report this achievement
and deliver the sword to him before
you can collect your reward!

Original: The short sword slowly floats toward
you, as if acknowledging you as its
owner.
Translation: The short sword slowly floats toward
you, as if acknowledging you as its
owner.

Original: It seems that the first part of the
client's parchment was found in the
Vessel Town.
[Page]
She tells you that the monster was
born long ago from human hands, when
all the races lived in harmony.
[Page]
The newborn monster was too powerful
and could not be tamed, so it was
decided that it would be sealed away.
[Page]
The Sentinels were the ones who made
the short sword to contain it.
[Page]
The Vessels used their magic to seal
the monster within, and the humans
created a key to secure the room.
[Page]
To ensure that the monster would never
awaken, they divided the key, with
each race taking one small piece.
Translation: It seems that the first part of the
client's parchment was found in the
Vessel Town.
[Page]
She tells you that the monster was
born long ago from human hands, when
all the races lived in harmony.
[Page]
The newborn monster was too powerful
and could not be tamed, so it was
decided that it would be sealed away.
[Page]
The Sentinels were the ones who made
the short sword to contain it.
[Page]
The Vessels used their magic to seal
the monster within, and the humans
created a key to secure the room.
[Page]
To ensure that the monster would never
awaken, they divided the key, with
each race taking one small piece.

Original: "No one ever dreamed that a monster
the ancient ones could not tame would
be defeated... You are mighty indeed.
[Page]
"That short sword seems to pose no
threat now. In fact, it appears to
have grown attached to you..."
[Page]
The Vessel woman smiles, says, "I must
report this to the elder," and walks
away to her town.
